itinerary.mapNote: Gondola to Sunshine, hike Citadel Pass 2360m. 2390m.
Mt Assiniboine 3618m — 'Matterhorn of the Rockies' above camp. 2165m.
Day hike Nublet 2742m. Rest and explore. 2165m.
Wonder Pass 2393m. Long descent to road at Mt Shark. 1980m.

waypoints.name: Mt Assiniboine Summit
waypoints.note: 'Matterhorn of the Rockies'. Dominant peak over camp.

waypoints.name: Citadel Pass
waypoints.note: Day 1 high point. Gateway into Assiniboine wilderness.

waypoints.name: Lake Magog
waypoints.note: Turquoise glacial lake. Assiniboine reflected on calm days.

waypoints.name: Wonder Pass
waypoints.note: Final pass. Marvel Lake below. Long descent to finish.
